name: Social Life
description: Hello, my name is Alvaro, I`m a spanish guy that make videogames, I got 11 years old, and I make this videogame with help of a free base project made by nicjamespanda. I modify all sprites and I wana make a multiplayer Life-simulating game. This is the first Alfa version of this project. You help me if you donate in my Patreon page:
